Text.Name: Place_WuDang_Taizipo
Text.Desc: Also named Crown Path, this place is where the Perfected Warrior cultivated his mortal body.

Text.Name: Place_WuDang_ZiXiaoGong
Text.Desc: The Purple Cloud Palace is situated on the main peak of the Wudang Mountains—beneath the Banner Peak northeast to the Heavenly Peak. It faces water against the mountains, a great place with perfect Feng Shui where a lot of cultivators live and practice.

Text.Name: Place_WuDang_NanYanGong
Text.Desc: Built atop the Southrock Peak of the Wudang Mountains, the palace faces a deep, dangerous chasm with a magnificent view. The famed Dragon Incense can be found within the palace and works wonders.

Text.Name: Place_WuDang_JinDing
Text.Desc: Standing atop the Heavenly Peak, it's where the Perfected Warrior once practiced and where the Taoist teachings on the Wudang Mountains began.
